content.text:
# Traditional games of Tibet

Tibet has many traditional games with origins dating up to 5,000 years ago.
Traditional games
Rock carrying
There are various rock-lifting competitions in Tibet which center around participants who carry and maneuver rocks that are  or more.
Board games
Gyiren
Gyiren is a popular Tibetan variation of snooker which originated in India.
Sho
Ming mang
Animal events
Horse racing
Polo
Polo has been played in Tibet since at least the early eight century.
Yak racing
See also
* Traditional games of China
* Traditional games of South Asia
